item.title: Ghattu Block in Gadwal ranks 5th nationwide in Delta Rankings
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: The NITI Aayog has announced the Delta Rankings for the Aspirational Blocks Programme (ABP) for the fourth quarter of 2024â€“25. Ghattu Block in Jogulamba Gadwal District achieved the 5th spot among 500 blocks nationwide and ranked 2nd in Zone 3, which includes Telangana, Andhra Pradesh, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, and Kerala.
Due to this remarkable achievement, Ghattu Block received a reward of Rs 1 crore from NITI Aayog. The rankings were revealed during a virtual national event attended ...]]>
item.author: Rajesh M, Latest News Hyderabad, Telangana, India, World, Please Enter Your Name Here
